subject: Build an optinlist now & Get started right away.
body:
Hi NetPreneur;

If you've ever pictured yourself owning a
massive opt-in list...


and creating an avalanche of cash each
time you push the 'send' button,...


then look no further.

I've stumbled an amazing piece of
software that actually PAYS you
while your list grows itself! 


==> http://tinyurl.com/3d3ej4


No kidding. 

And it doesn't matter if you currently
do not have an existing list, product
or website. 


For a limited time period only, you can
grab one of the 129 FREE Beta testing
accounts left... 

and see just how powerful this software is! 

So go grab your account now before
it's too late.


==> http://tinyurl.com/3d3ej4


With this software, you'll actually get paid
while you see your list grow right before
your very eyes.


It's that powerful. 
So make sure you get your FREE account now!


==> http://tinyurl.com/3d3ej4



To your Success


Vanessa & Raddy
Massive Builder system
113 Sweethome Road
Belzoni MS 39038




This mailing list is opt-in only. We are linked to plenty of web 
sites that offer free subscriptions to our mailing list. 
You are on our mailing list because you have subscribed at 
one of our associate web sites, sent us email or we have a 
previous online relationship.You may LEAVE this list at any time. 
To be removed from our Mailing List, simply replay 
to mailto:cute_can_kill@yahoo.com  with REMOVE in the SUBJECT line, 
your name will be remove from our database immediately.
